question: International Stuttering Awareness Day was observed on __________.
explanation: International Stuttering Awareness Day was observed all over the world on October 22, the theme for International Stuttering Awareness Day 2017 is 'A World That Understands Stuttering'. The International Stuttering Association has been conducting online conference since 2013.This year's online conference was conducted from 1st October to 22nd October 2017.
